name: ARcade Plane
description:
BIG INDIE PITCH finalist combining AR & arcade one-touch gameplay!
iPhone X ready - play unique AR game on your new device!

IMPORTANT:

This game requires ARKit & camera access.

THIS GAME IS NOT SUPPORTED on: iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, iPad 2 Air nor iPads Mini

WORKS GREAT on: iPhone X, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 Plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 Plus, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6s Plus, iPhone SE, all iPads Pro, iPad 5th Gen

Fly around your room, around the parking spot or playground. Collect stars to fill the fuel tank, pass as many levels as possible. The more levels you pass - the bigger your city is. How many citizens will join you?

Simple one-touch gameplay in AR environment gives tons of fun! Unlock all the planes, collect income directly from your city and become the greatest flying mayor in the world!

Features:
- funny flying in AR environment!
- simple one-touch controls - tap & hold to dive!
- 20+ airplanes to unlock
- developing city + collecting income mode (TAP THE STARS!)
- Global Leaderboards & Achievements (Game Center)
- now Augmented Reality gives even more fun!
- iPhone X fully supported
